Paragraph: The second mother had a male infant by caesarean section .

| Chemical |
| --- |
| caesarean section |

This is the only potential chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph, which is a medical procedure referred to as a caesarean section. It is often used when a vaginal delivery is not possible or safe for the mother or baby. The procedure involves making an incision in the mother's abdomen and uterus to deliver the baby. While not a chemical substance itself, it is commonly associated with certain medications and anesthetics used during the procedure.
